title: Butchers Bridge and ARAM
body:
I cannot imagine why such a great map had such a short lived availability.

I would love to see this map make a return as a random chance for all ARAM games, Random champs and random map. This would be great to keep the game fresh and to celebrate the hard work that went into making such a cool and unique map.

replies.body: I though Butchers Bridge was fantastic, id love for it to return as often as possible.

Players know what they are getting into when the game mode states ALL RANDOM, this should include the map and even the anouncer, who should sometimes just use other player quotes to keep it a truly random experience

Fuckit, players no longer choose their items, ALL RANDOM!

In fact items randomly change to other random items at random intervals throughout the game and players randomly change team sides while randomly changing what champion the player is playing

I have no idea how difficult it would be to set up random chance map variants with the current client but maybe that's something they've considered with the new one. If not, there's always a possibility it could be brought up alongside Black Market Brawlers for a weekend, if they've been planning on it. They could even set up a rotation specifically for map variants (including updated Magma Chamber, Winter SR, Halloween SR) which is unlikely but one can dream ; )
I just want that Bilgewater music back in game more than anything. It's a lot more lively than the current Summoner's Rift/Howling Abyss music.
